Class WPage

java.lang.Object
us.mn.state.dot.tms.utils.wysiwyg.WPage
public class WPage extends Object
WePage - WYSIWYG Editor Page Object A group of WToken objects which, collectively, represents a MULTI page.
Author:
John L. Stanley - SRF Consulting, Gordon Parikh - SRF Consulting

  • Method Details

    • addToken

      public void addToken(WToken tok)
      Add token to the end of the page Called during initial MULTI string parsing.
      Parameters:
      tok - WToken to be added.

    • addToken

      public void addToken(int tokIndx, WToken tok)
      Add token tok at the specified index

    • removeToken

      public Iterator<WToken> tokens()

    • getTokenList

      public WTokenList getTokenList()

    • getNumTokens

      public int getNumTokens()

    • isEmpty

      public boolean isEmpty()

    • getTokenIndex

      public int getTokenIndex(WToken tok)
      Get the index of the token in this page's token list.

    • makeGuiRectangles

      public void makeGuiRectangles(int threshold)
      Create WgTextRect and WgColorRect objects for this page to assist with GUI operations. Requires that this page's WRaster has had it's WYSIWYG image size set.

    • makeGuiTextRects

      public void makeGuiTextRects(int threshold)
      Create WgTextRect objects for this page to assist with GUI operations. Requires that this page's WRaster has had it's WYSIWYG image size set. WgTextRect objects in this list are in reverse order compared to their order in MULTI so that searches happen from front to back.

    • makeGuiColorRects

      public void makeGuiColorRects(int threshold)
      Create WgColorRect objects for this page to assist with GUI operations. Requires that this page's WRaster has had it's WYSIWYG image size set.

    • getTextRects

      public ArrayList<WgTextRect> getTextRects()
      Return an ArrayList of WgTextRects that represent the text rectangles on this page, used for GUI operations. WgTextRects must be initialized first with the makeGuiTextRects method.

    • getColorRects

      public ArrayList<WgColorRect> getColorRects()
      Return an ArrayList of WgColorRects that represent the text rectangles on this page, used for GUI operations. WgColorRects must be initialized first with the makeGuiColorRects method.

    • getLines

      public ArrayList<WTokenList> getLines()
      Return an ArrayList of WTokenLists containing the lines of the message on this page. Note that the [nl] tags ARE included at the end of each array.

    • getLineIndex

      public int getLineIndex(WToken tok)
      Get the index of the line on which this token is found.
      Returns:
      the index of the line, or -1 if not found

    • getTokenLine

      public WTokenList getTokenLine(WToken tok)
      Get the line on which this token found.
      Returns:
      the WTokenList representing the line, or null if not found

    • getNumLines

      public int getNumLines()
      Return the number of lines on the page.

    • findClosestTextToken

      public WToken findClosestTextToken(WPoint p, boolean includeNonPrint)
      Return the closest text token to the point sx, sy (sign coordinates). If includeNonPrint is false, only printable text characters (including spaces and newlines) are included, otherwise all tokens that aren't text/color rectangles or graphics are included.

    • getTokensOfType

      public WTokenList getTokensOfType(WTokenType tokType)

    • findClosestTokenOfType

      public WToken findClosestTokenOfType(WPoint p, WTokenType tokType)

    • findNextTokenOfType

      public WToken findNextTokenOfType(int si, WTokenType... tokTypes)
      Return the next token with a type that matches any of the types provided, starting the search at si.

    • findPrevTokenOfType

      public WToken findPrevTokenOfType(int si, WTokenType... tokTypes)
      Return the previous token with a type that matches any of the types provided, starting the search at si.

    • isLast

      public boolean isLast(WToken tok)
      Determine if this is the last token of the page.

      public boolean isValid()

      Convert page to equivalent MULTI string

      Returns:

      Set the width/height of the WYSIWYG image rendered from this page.
      Throws:

    • containsAny

      public boolean containsAny(WTokenType type)
      Test for a specific token-type anywhere on the page.
      Parameters:
      type - WTokenType to look for
      Returns:
      true if a token of that type was found, false if it was not.

    • removeAll

      public boolean removeAll(WTokenType type)
      Remove all tokens of a specific token-type anywhere on the page.
      Parameters:
      type - WTokenType to look for
      Returns:
      true if any tokens of that type were removed, false if none were found.
